Query: How to convert a m4a sound file to mp3?

Answers.MP Summary: encode audio into the Opus format
Answers.Most Similar TLDR Task: Convert 5.1 surround sound audio at the highest quality level
Top-3 Similar Questions: au_211054: How to convert a sound file to Opus
Top-3 Scripts:
au_211054: opusenc input.wav output.opus

ffmpeg -i input.mp3 -f wav - | opusenc --bitrate 256 - output.opus

Answers.MP Summary: displays and manipulates id3-tags on mp3 files
Answers.Most Similar TLDR Task: Set the title of an MP3 file
Top-3 Similar Questions: su_341993: Is there a command-line tool that converts tags to id3v2.3?

Answers.Most Similar TLDR Task: Extract the sound from a video and save it as MP3
Top-3 Similar Questions: au_95753: Convert lossless m4a to flac
ul_438927: Convert all found m4a to mp3
su_668766: Unable to convert m4a to mp3
Top-3 Scripts:
au_95753: sudo apt-get install ffmpeg

ffmpeg -i filein.m4a -f flac fileout.flac

ul_438927: find . -name '*.m4a' -print0 | while read -d '' -r file; do
  ffmpeg -i "$file" -n -acodec libmp3lame -ab 128k "${file%.m4a}.mp3" < /dev/null
done

Explanations about Options.-acodec: Set the audio codec. This is an alias for "-codec:a".
Explanations about Options.-aq: Set the audio quality (codec-specific, VBR). This is an alias for -q:a.
Explanations about Options.-n:
Do not overwrite output files, and exit immediately if a specified output file already
 exists.

Top-3 Similar Questions: au_59520: How to convert wav to ogg and mp3 using VBR
au_710378: Script: Recursively convert wma files to MP3, then remove WMA files
Top-3 Scripts:
au_59520: sudo apt-get install lame

lame -V 5 file.wav file.mp3

lame -V 5 --add-id3v2 --pad-id3v2 --ignore-tag-errors --ta artist --tl album --tt title --tn track --ty year --tg genre --tc comment file.wav file.mp3

su_15327: $ sudo apt-get install mp32ogg lame
$ wget ftp://ftp.pbone.net/mirror/plf.zarb.org/plf/mandrake/10.1/noarch/ogg2mp3-0.3-3plf.noarch.rpm
$ sudo alien ogg2mp3-0.3-3plf.noarch.rpm
$ sudo dpkg -i ogg2mp3_0.3-4_all.deb

Explanations about Options.--tl: audio/song album (max 30 chars for version 1 tag)
Explanations about Options.--ignore-tag-errors: ignore errors in values passed for tags, use defaults in case an error occurs
Explanations about Options.-V:
Enable VBR (Variable BitRate) and specifies the value of VBR quality (default = 4).
 Decimal values can be specified, like 4.51.
 0 = highest quality.
Explanations about Options.--ta: audio/song artist (max 30 chars for version 1 tag)
